uuid.description: A string identifier formatted according to IETF RFC 4122.

date.description: A string formatted as defined in ISO 8601. The format is [yyyy]-[mm]-[dd].

language-tag.description: A string formatted according to IETF RFC 5646 (langusge tag).

int64.description: A string instance is valid against this attribute if it contains an integer in the range [-(2**63), (2**63)-1]

uint64.description: A string instance is valid against this attribute if it contains an integer in the range [0, (2**64)-1]
